creator_2: Lt. K. E. Kochunni Nair, I.N.A. (?)
physical_appearance: This clipping is an article from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly' published on 7 July 1946. The clipping includes an excerpt of the article in the center of the page. The page also features four black-and-white photographs. The left and right edges of the page are torn.
sgcool_label_text: "Prior to the World War II period, Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political, sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions, inspired by the ""call for freedom"" in India
title_text: The Orient Weekly The Story Of The Indian Independence Movement in East Asia
